short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your MongoDB Atlas experience: automatically terminate slow operations during server issues for optimal performance.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Are you struggling with database issues? With numerous operations running, it can be challenging to pinpoint the troublesome query. Simply navigate to the real-time page of your MongoDB Atlas cluster, configure the extension, and identify the problem within seconds. While the extension handles the heavy lifting to keep your cluster healthy, take advantage of this time to fix the issue seamlessly.
